en.toast2: 1- The number entered cannot be 0 at the beginning.<hr>2- You cannot enter the same number again.<hr>
en.howTo:
Find the Number in 8 tries.

Each guess must be a 4-digit number. You cannot enter the same number again.

You can play with numpad or keyboard.

After each guess, the color of the right circle changes according to your guess

Examples

The two numbers are wrong.
A number's place is correct, a number's place is wrong.
The three numbers are correct.




2022, Made by Wonception.
